availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Woodford County, Kentucky, Steele was married to Mary D. Winston. He was a lawyer in Woodford County and served as Judge of the Woodford County Court.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, “William Jameson Steele (August 10, 1809-January 11, 1884),” Memorial #77109087, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=77109087 (accessed June 5, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford, not stated, p.122.
